sentences.en: Although he is 11th in line to the throne, Mr Phillips does not have a royal title as his mother declined to give her children the HRH title at birth.
sentences.cn: 虽然菲利普斯在继承王位的资格上排到了第十一名，但是由于母亲在他出生时，拒绝传给他殿下的头衔，菲利普斯并没有皇室头衔。

sentences.en: HRH The Earl of Wessex KCVO ( Prince Edward ), is also invited to participate in this function.
sentences.cn: 而韦塞赫斯伯爵 ( 爱德华王子 ) 更应邀出席是次于香港举办的盛事呢!

sentences.en: October - The Mai Po Wildlife Education Centre opened by WWF International President HRH Duke of Edinburgh.
sentences.cn: 米埔野生生物教育中心开幕,由世界自然基金会国际会长爱丁堡公爵主持开幕仪式.

sentences.en: The knowledge of HRH is extensive and much of them belongs to constructive and describing knowledge.
sentences.cn: 即有描述性知识,又有逻辑性、运算性知识.

sentences.en: Treacy said he was "delighted, flattered and touched by HRH Princess’ Beatrice’s decision to donate the hat to charity."
sentences.cn: 崔西表示，“比特莱斯公主殿下拍卖帽子捐赠善款的决定让我很高兴、很荣幸、也很感动。”
